intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: My Detail Area is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our dealership management platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
collection.item1: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
collection.item2: Dealership information (business name, address, tax ID)
collection.item3: Vehicle and customer data entered into the system
collection.item4: Usage data and analytics to improve our service

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to:
usage.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our dealership management services
usage.item2: Process transactions and send related information
usage.item3: Send technical notices, updates, security alerts, and support messages
usage.item4: Respond to your comments, questions, and customer service requests

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.item1: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
rights.item2: Rectify inaccurate or incomplete personal data
rights.item3: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.item4: Object to or restrict processing of your personal data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using My Detail Area, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

usage.title: Use of Service
usage.content: You agree to use My Detail Area only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:
usage.item1: Use the service in any way that violates applicable laws or regulations
usage.item2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the service
usage.item3: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
usage.item4: Upload or transmit viruses or any other malicious code

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for:
accounts.item1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
accounts.item2: All activities that occur under your account
accounts.item3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by My Detail Area and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: My Detail Area shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
